title: Best car manufacturers based on build quality in Great Britain ( UK ) 2014
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage score for 15 number of Automobile Manufacturerss.
Automobile Manufacturers Lexus has the highest Percentage score and Toyota has the lowest Percentage score.
Automobile Manufacturers Toyota has 1.06 times less Percentage score than Automobile Manufacturers Lexus which is the highest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Automobile Manufacturers in the x axis and Percentage score in the y axis.
Automobile Manufacturers Lexus has the highest Percentage score and Toyota has the lowest Percentage score.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage score for 15 number of Automobile Manufacturerss.
Automobile Manufacturers Lexus has the highest Percentage score and Toyota has the lowest Percentage score.
Automobile Manufacturers Toyota has 1.06 times less Percentage score than Automobile Manufacturers Lexus which is the highest.
max_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Automobile Manufacturers, and Percentage score in each Automobile Manufacturers on the y axis.
The maximum Percentage score 94.27 is found at Automobile Manufacturers Lexus and the minimum is found at Toyota where Automobile Manufacturers is 88.85.
The second highest Percentage score is appeared to be the Automobile Manufacturers Porsche.
The difference of Percentage score between the highest and lowest Automobile Manufacturers is 5.42.
The Automobile Manufacturers Lexus has the highest Percentage score, followed by Porsche, and Audi. Down to the Automobile Manufacturers Toyota which is the lowest.
The Automobile Manufacturers Toyota tends to be 1.03 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Automobile Manufacturerss, we get total 1375.61.
